March 2020 County of Marin EMS BLS T1
TRAUMATIC EMERGENCIES-
HEAD, EYE, AND SPINE
Indications
• Patient with a traumatic injury to the head, eye and/or spine
BLS RMC
Spinal immobilization if indicated
• Control bleeding
• Prevent further injuries
Prepare for early and rapid transport to the appropriate facility
Head Trauma Eye Trauma Traumatic Paralysis
• Suction as needed • Cover both eyes • Frequent evaluation of
• Frequent evaluation of CSM, neuro checks
LOC
• Support airway if
emesis occurs
• Calm/reassure patient
SPECIAL CONSIDERATION
• Patients meeting anatomic, physiologic, high
energy transfer, and other mechanism of injury
on the Marin County Trauma Triage Tool
should be transported with ALS level of care
